hotels.title: Idyllic Hilton Head Island Elegance with Three Championship Golf Courses, Five Restaurants & Spa
hotels.description: Escape to a coastal retreat set on the sugar-white sands of South Carolina's Hilton Head Island. The resort boasts three championship golf courses and three refreshing swimming pools. Savour gourmet cuisine at HH Prime, sip on a refreshing cocktail at the poolside Buoy Bar, or indulge in a soothing treatment at the Ocean Tides Spa. Or explore the island's charming boutiques, world-class golf courses, and the historic Harbour Town Lighthouse, all within easy reach.
